name: The Dragon Represents Free Will
description:
Created by Jessica McNeme, Ashley Yantz, and Riley Kent for the VIST 205 Game Project. Created in 4 weeks.

Adventure as a mysterious knight, chosen by an even more mysterious god to achieve the most mysterious of purposes. Whether or not you obey your commands will effect not only the dialogue, but the ending that you receive! Run through the game sword blazing or try your hand at some platforming- or just sit there and do nothing. It's all up to you in "The Dragon Represents Free Will"!!
